testcase.name: To verify that if user has entered correct AdminId, Password, Language and requiredtoken as true
testcase.skipped: Given User connect to registration URL......................................undefined When User enter AdminId "ValidValue", Password "ValidValue", Language "en" and requiredToken "true" using registration JSON.undefined Then User get valid response code "200" in Response Body....................undefined And Response Body should have "Contain" Token value.........................undefined

testcase.name: To verify that if user has entered correct AdminId, Password, Language and requiredtoken as false
testcase.skipped: Given User connect to registration URL......................................undefined When User enter AdminId "ValidValue", Password "ValidValue", Language "en" and requiredToken "false" using registration JSON.undefined Then User get valid response code "200" in Response Body....................undefined And Response Body should have "NotContain" Token value......................undefined
